name: Earning status levels from points earned for status level <Status Level>

testSteps.description: 1: Earning status levels from points earned for status level STANDARD ({Min Points=0, Max Points=999, Status Level=STANDARD})

children.description: Given Stan is a new Frequent Flyer Member
When he earns between 0 and 999 points
Then his status should become STANDARD

testSteps.description: 2: Earning status levels from points earned for status level BRONZE ({Min Points=1000, Max Points=1999, Status Level=BRONZE})

children.description: Given Stan is a new Frequent Flyer Member
When he earns between 1000 and 1999 points
Then his status should become BRONZE

testSteps.description: 3: Earning status levels from points earned for status level SILVER ({Min Points=2000, Max Points=4999, Status Level=SILVER})

children.description: Given Stan is a new Frequent Flyer Member
When he earns between 2000 and 4999 points
Then his status should become SILVER

testSteps.description: 4: Earning status levels from points earned for status level GOLD ({Min Points=5000, Max Points=, Status Level=GOLD})

children.description: Given Stan is a new Frequent Flyer Member
When he earns between 5000 and  points
Then his status should become GOLD

userStory.narrative:
Frequent Flyers earn status points each time they fly.
  As they earn more points, their status level increases and they get more benefits.

title: Earning status levels from points earned for status level <Status Level>

rule.name: Members achieve new status levels when they earn sufficient points

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given Stan is a new Frequent Flyer Member
When he earns between <Min Points> and <Max Points> points
Then his status should become <Status Level>
